1128.name: 309LSi
1128.Applications: Buffer layers before hard facing, dissimilar joints between ferritic and austenitic steels and or difficult to weld steels.
1128.Suitable_For: Buffer layers before hard facing, dissimilar joints between ferritic and austenitic steels and or difficult to weld steels such as: 42CrMo4, C45, 42MnV7, tool steels etc.
